Name: Create Azure Resources - WA
Description:
The New-AzureRmAppServicePlan cmdlet creates a new app service plan.
The New-AzureRmWebApp cmdlet creates a new web app.

Parameters.Name: ResourceGroupName
Parameters.Label: ResourceGroupName
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the name of the resource group you are deploying this Web App into

Parameters.Name: Location
Parameters.Label: DeploymentLocation
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the location (Region) where the service plan is located

Parameters.Name: AppServicePlanName
Parameters.Label: AppServicePlanName
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the name of the app service plan

Parameters.Name: AppServicePlanTier
Parameters.Label: AppServicePlanTier
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the tier of the app service plan

Parameters.Name: WebAppName
Parameters.Label: WebAppName
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the name of your web app

Parameters.Name: AppServiceUse32BitWorkerProcess
Parameters.Label: AppServiceUse32BitWorkerProcess
Parameters.HelpText:
Sets the app pool for 32-bit processes or 64-bit processes.
Use 1 for 32-bit
Use 0 for 64-bit

Parameters.Name: AzureAccount
Parameters.Label: AzureAccount
Parameters.HelpText: Enter the SPN used to connect to Azure
